settings.budget_month_range: Your budget month now runs from {{startDay}}th to {{endDay}}th

settings.currency_note: This currency symbol will be used throughout the app.
settings.period_range: Your budget month runs from the {{startDay}}th of each month to the {{endDay}}th of the following month.
settings.manual_period_note: Manually start a new budget period
settings.archive_note: This will archive all current expenses and reset your spending to ‚Çæ0 while keeping your budget categories.
settings.archive_confirm: Are you sure you want to archive the current period? This will move all current expenses to the archive and you can view them later.
settings.archive_success_desc: {{count}} expenses from {{period}} have been archived. You can view them in the Archive section.
settings.archive_failed_desc: There was an error archiving the period. Please try again.
settings.no_data_to_archive_desc: There are no expenses in the current period to archive.
settings.language_note: Choose your preferred language for the app.
settings.period_section_description: Set the start and end day for your monthly budget period.
settings.api_key_description: Generate an API key to connect your bank transactions to Spend Wise. Use this key in your API requests to automatically import transactions.
settings.api_key_security_note: Keep this key secure. Anyone with this key can import transactions to your account.
settings.api_key_usage_note: Use this key in the X-API-Key header when making API requests.
settings.api_key_generated_desc: New API key has been created and saved
settings.api_key_copied_desc: API key has been copied to clipboard
settings.delete_api_key_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your API key? This action cannot be undone.
settings.api_key_deleted_desc: Your API key has been permanently deleted

analytics.title: Financial Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Comprehensive insights into your spending patterns
analytics.budget_warning_desc: You're approaching your budget limit. Consider reviewing your spending.
analytics.great_progress_desc: You're well within your budget. Keep up the good work!
analytics.over_budget_desc: This category has exceeded its planned amount.

archive.title: Archive
archive.description: View and analyze your archived spending periods
archive.no_archived_data_desc: You haven't archived any periods yet. Archive a period from Settings to view it here.

advisor.title: Your Personal Financial Advisor
advisor.subtitle: AI-powered insights and recommendations

advisor.great_job_desc: You're managing your finances well. Keep up the good work!

budget-warning.title: Budget Warning
budget-warning.desc: You're spending more than planned in several categories.
budget-warning.action: Review your spending and adjust your budget categories.

budget-opportunity.title: Budget Opportunity
budget-opportunity.desc: You have room to increase savings or invest in other areas.
budget-opportunity.action: Consider increasing your savings goals or investing the surplus.

savings-low.title: Low Savings Rate
savings-low.desc: Your savings rate is below recommended levels.
savings-low.action: Try to save at least 20% of your income each month.

emergency-fund.title: Emergency Fund
emergency-fund.desc: Consider building an emergency fund for unexpected expenses.
emergency-fund.action: Aim to save 3-6 months of living expenses.
